alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 7:01AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade, southeastern Lawrence and west central Pennington Counties through 730 AM MDT... At 701 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles west of Nemo, or 14 miles southeast of Lead, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea to nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Silver City around 705 AM MDT. Nemo, Dalton Lake and Pactola Reservoir around 710 AM MDT. Summerset, Johnson Siding and Piedmont around 720 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hisega and Black Hawk. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 45 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
